title: AlexanderTechnique.com
description: A general, comprehensive guide to AT. Includes a location-based teacher finder, information for musicians, and links to many external resources.

title: American Society for the Alexander Technique
description: An organization for professional AT practitioners; students can find a professionally certified AT teacher.

title: Society of Teachers of the Alexander Technique
description: An organization for professional AT practitioners with information of general interest.

title: Alexander Technique Center of Washington
description: A Washington D.C.-based organization with general information about the history and theory of AT.

title: Alexander Technique Science
description: An overview of scientific research on AT, articles, videos, and general information.

title: Alexander Studies Online
description: Has a curated database of research and a community for people interested in the scientific side of AT.

title: Body Learning Podcast
description: An Alexander Technique podcast with a number of episodes about singing.

title: Alexander Audio: The Alexander Technique, Singing and Voice
description: A collection of interviews about Alexander Technique and the voice.

title: ATsinging Tips Blog
description: The blog of a NYC-based AT studio with many in-depth posts on AT and singing.

title: Free Body Free Voice - Blog
description: Michael Hanko, a voice/AT teacher in NYC with an entertaining and accessible blog.

title: Cantare Studio - Blog: Embodied Thought
description: Marieke Schuurs, voice/AT teacher. Blog posts are short and interesting.

title: The Briceland Studio - Articles
description: Alicia Briceland, voice/AT teacher with many informative articles on AT and general singing topics.
